entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as being drawn to this spot by Harry.

entities.name: patronus
entities.description: The doe is described as a Patronus, which is a guardian of the pool.

entities.name: sword
entities.description: The sword is mentioned as being placed in the pool for Harry to find.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who is searching for and trying to retrieve the sword.

relationships.description: Harry is trying to retrieve the sword from the pool.
The Patronus (doe) is a guardian of the pool.
Hermione is related to Harry, as she was drawn to this spot by him.
